titles: By the King, a proclamation for the prohibiting the importation of blue paper
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the 20th of July, in the eighteenth year of our reign."
